1.title: POM Wonderful v. Coca-Cola

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: John talks about the Indian election, Pom Wonderful, and talks with the former NSA director General Keith Alexander.

2.title: Capital Punishment

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: John talks about the recent issues of the death penalty, François Hollande, and the rising issues happening in Brunei.

3.title: Climate Change Denial

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: John talks about Eurovision, Ukraine and Russia's relations, and invites Bill Nye to a statistically representative climate change debate.

4.title: The Right to Be Forgotten

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: John talks about the product recall going on at General Motors, the EU Court of Justice "Right to be Forgotten" ruling, and updates us on how the Indian election is going, with help from Fareed Zakaria.

5.title: Net Neutrality

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: This week's topics include the rise of the far right political parties in Europe, the Ukrainian election, Afghanistan, Net Neutrality, Australia's hard-line right-wing Prime Minister Tony Abbott, and the 2014 Scripps National Spelling Bee.

6.title: FIFA and the World Cup

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: John Oliver discusses the anniversary of the Tiananmen Square rebellion and the FIFA World Cup and invites Right Said Fred to send a message to Bashar al-Assad.

7.title: Immigration Reform

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: John discusses immigration, the Washington Redskins and Iraq and talks to Stephen Hawking.

8.title: Dr. Oz

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: John highlights recent news such as the problems of tourism in Antarctica, discusses international royalty as a service to Game of Thrones fans and panders to the audience in response to allegations against Dr. Oz.

9.title: Burwell v. Hobby Lobby

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: John Oliver sheds light on recent Supreme Court cases and discusses gay rights in Uganda with activist Pepe Julian Onziema.

10.title: Income Inequality and Wealth Inequality

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: John revisits news of a change in Japan's foreign policy, the love letters of Warren G. Harding and CIA's social media activity, and discusses the issues of income inequality in America.

11.title: Incarceration in the United States

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: John talks about Gaza (but mostly Anderson Cooper) and about Malaysia Airlines flight 17, then discusses prison incarcerations in America and sings with muppets from Sesame Street.

12.title: Nuclear Weapons and the United States

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: John addresses the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, revisits the subject of international royalty, discusses the safety of nuclear weapons and campaigns to save geckos in space.

13.title: Native Advertising

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: John discusses native advertising and Argentine debt restructuring.

14.title: Payday Loans

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: John discusses payday loans and Russia's import embargo on U.S. chicken and soybean.

15.title: Shooting of Michael Brown and Police Militarization

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Focuses on the shooting of Michael Brown and police militarization in Ferguson, MO. John also discusses the topic of equal pay for equal work.

16.title: Student Debt

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: John provides a eulogy for the mating space geckos, and talks about student debt.

17.title: Scottish Independence Referendum

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: John discusses the Scottish independence referendum and corporations using Twitter.

18.title: United States Embargo Against Cuba, Miss America 2015

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: John focuses on the Miss America 2015 pageant with special guest Kathy Griffin.

19.title: Drones

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: John discusses U.S. military drones and the Kansas state budget shortfall.

20.title: Civil Forfeiture

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: John Oliver shows us how desperate the American law enforcement are to make money out of everyone.

21.title: Military Translators

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Translators who have aided the U.S. Military in Afghanistan and Iraq are in great danger in their home countries, but red tape is making it impossible for many of them to leave.

22.title: Sugar

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: John Oliver is back to discuss how the sugar industry rules the world!

23.title: State Legislatures and ALEC

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: John disusses robot sales associates at Lowe's, U.S legislatures in elections, and the American Legislative Exchange Council (ALEC).

24.title: The Lottery

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Last Week Tonight features in-depth and critical look at state lotteries. It also looks at the Turkish Prime Minister's Grand Palace and a Salmon shooting cannon.

1.title: Marketing to Doctors

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: John Oliver discusses the growing issues of pharmaceutical companies marketing directly to and through doctors.

2.title: Tobacco

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: John riffs on Ecuadorian President Rafael Correa, '50 Shades of Grey', and the unethical legal practices of tobacco company Phillip Morris International.

3.title: Judicial Elections

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: John discusses United Kingdom general elections, judicial elections, and the Chinese New Year.

4.title: Infrastructure

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: John demonstrates the importance of infrastructure with a special sketch starring Edward Norton, Vincent D'Onofrio, and Steve Buscemi. He also discusses Boris Nemstov.

5.title: U.S. Territories

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: John Oliver discusses a Fanta controversy in Germany, citizenship grievances for those in U.S. territories, and cigarette packaging.

6.title: The NCAA

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The NCAA doesn't pay students athletes because they are considered to be amateurs. They are considered to be amateurs because they don't get paid.

7.title: Municipal Violations

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: If you have money, committing a municipal violation may pose you a minor inconvenience. If you don't, it can ruin your life.

8.title: Government Surveillance

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: John heads to Russia to interview Edward Snowden as part of a segment on government surveillance.

9.title: IRS

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: John discusses the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), with a special appearance from Michael Bolton.

10.title: Patents

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: John discusses patents, Earth Day, and doomsday, with a special appearance from Martin Sheen.

11.title: Fashion

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: John Oliver explores the concept of changing and cheap fashion and some of the ugliest truths of the manufacturing process.

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.title: Paid Family Leave

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: John discusses Victory Day in Russia, paid parental leave, and Japanese government mascots.

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.title: FIFA

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: John discusses the 2015 FIFA corruption case.

16.title: Bail

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: John explains why America's bail system is better for the reality TV industry than it is for the justice system.

17.title: Torture

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: John discusses the 2015 European Games, the Canadian Senate expenses scandal, and torture with the voice of special guest Helen Mirren.

18.title: The Internet

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Online harassment is a major problem, but it is rarely prosecuted. If only we'd been warned about this in the early days of the internet.

19.title: Transgender Rights

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: John discusses US Supreme Court decisions on gay marriage and Obamacre, former President of Ukraine, Viktor Yanukovych, transgender rights and leap second.

20.title: Stadiums

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: John discusses how taxpayer money is funding private sports stadiums.

21.title: Food Waste

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Iran nuclear treaty; El Chapo prison escape; North Korea hosting Laibach band; food waste.

22.title: Mandatory Minimums

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: John explains why mandatory minimum sentences, especially for drug-related crimes, are in desperate need of reform.

23.title: District of Columbia

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: John explains why Washington, D.C. deserves to be the 51st state - or at least get full voting rights in Congress.

24.title: Sex Ed

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Sex education in America; GOP Debate; India's short-lived porn-site ban; overpricing at Whole Foods.

25.title: Church

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: John discusses predatory churches and TV evangelism, the raising of the American flag in Cuba, the redesign of New Zealand's flag, and President Harding's illegitimate child.

26.title: LGBT Anti-Discrimination

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Despite the victory for marriage equality this summer, there is a long way to go to end LGBT discrimination, as John explains.

27.title: Public Defenders

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: John talks about problems concerning public defenders in the American Judicial system, a Michigan state legislature scandal, Guatemala's unusual election, and Queen Elizabeth II and delivers a message from the Lady of Perpetual Exemption.

28.title: Migrants and Refugees

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: John talks about Pope Francis visiting the USA and the immigration crisis in Europe.

29.title: Mental Health

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: John discusses Russia's involvement in Syria, the U.N. General Assembly, and the problems with the national system for treating mental illness.

30.title: North Dakota

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: John takes a look at the harmful effects of the oil boom in North Dakota.

31.title: Canada

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

31.plot: John discusses the upcoming Canadian election and urges Canadians not to vote for Stephen Harper.

32.title: Medicaid Gap

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

32.plot: Main story: Election 2015 and the Medicaid Gap; plus, China & Kenny G.; Syria peace talks; 'Star Wars' impact on Ukraine elections; United Kingdom tax credit vote.

33.title: Prisoner Re-Entry

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

33.plot: United Kingdom proposed online mass surveillance law, Veterans Day, Washington Redskin trademark, Prisoner Reentry. Interview with Bilal Chapman.

34.title: Daily Fantasy Sports

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

34.plot: John talks about the recent Paris attacks, China's Singles Day, the Koh-i-Noor diamond and Daily Fantasy Sports.

35.title: Pennies

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

35.plot: John reflects about the Paris attacks aftermath and how useless the U.S. penny is.

1.title: Voting

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: John talks about the late Antonin Scalia and the Supreme Court, Chipotle's food safety problems, Voter IDs and New Zealand's economic development minister Steven Joyce.

2.title: Abortion Laws

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: John talks about the South Carolina Republican primary, the Supreme Court vacancy and abortion laws.

3.title: Donald Trump

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: John talks about the Egyptian president and economic crisis, the Guantanamo Bay shutdown and Donald Trump.

4.title: Special Districts

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: John talks about special districts, local elections, US election 2016 and of course Donald Trump again.

5.title: Encryption

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: John talks about latest US election updates, International women's day, Apple's encryption battle with the FBI.

6.title: The Wall

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: John talks about latest Brazil demonstrations, the nomination of Merrick Garland to join the supreme court And the wall Donald Trump wants to build and how it would be very costly, ineffective and useless.

7.title: Political Fundraising

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Congressional Fund-raising with guest Steve Israel- Episode explores the ways congress does fund-raising focusing on cold calls, similar to call centers.

8.title: Credit Reports

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: John talks about the Panama papers leak, Alabama governor sex scandal, Credit reports and background checks companies and how their results can be false and unreliable.

9.title: Lead

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: John covers the Flint water crisis, the Böhmermann affair, and Vladimir Putin's call-in show.

10.title: Puerto Rico

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Obama's visits to the UK and Saudi Arabia, the ongoing debt crisis in Puerto Rico, and Norway's policy towards asylum seekers are all discussed.

11.title: Scientific Studies

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Main story: Scientific Studies; plus, Philippines' presidential frontrunner Rodrigo Duterte, Workers' Party Congress in North Korea; And Now: "The Next President of the United States."

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: John Oliver gives an open invitation to Trump's 1980s PR man alter ego "John Miller" then reports on the 911 phone system's failures to keep up with the new issues from so many mobile device users.

13.title: Primaries and Caucuses

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: John covers Venezuela's current economic crisis, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's recent parliamentary incident, and outlines issues surrounding the delegate selection process used in state primaries and caucuses.

14.title: Debt Buyers

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: John lays out documents recently released in the ongoing lawsuit against one of Donald Trump's business venture's, Trump University. In the main story, John explains the ins and outs and sometimes shady dealings of the debt buying industry.

15.title: Money

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Tonight's main story focuses on navigating the complex financial labyrinth of retirement plans, including hints to get through the maze. John also highlights the emerging social media war between 2016 presidential candidates Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump.

16.title: United Kingdom

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: The main story tonight concerns the upcoming in/out referendum regarding the UK's future status in the EU. John muses both sides of the issue, yet despite being torn, eventually endorses a position in what has become his own unique style. John also examines the NRA's political influence over gun legislation.

17.title: Doping

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: John talks about Brexit and the handling of doping issues by the Olympics management and doping in general.

18.title: Republican National Convention

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: John talks about US election 2016, Republican National Convention, appointment of Boriss Johnson as UK Foreign Secretary, unauthorized use of songs in political campaigns and a bit more about Donald Trump.

19.title: DNC vs. RNC

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Highlights of US Democratic Party convention 2016.

20.title: Journalism

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: John talks about the Olympics Opening Ceremony and the main story is about Journalism and the descent of printed news.

21.title: Auto Lending

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: John talks about the 2016 US election, American Petroleum Institute copying "Last Week Tonight with John Oliver" credits and how auto lenders can trap vulnerable people in debt.

22.title: Charter Schools

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: John talks about Rio Olympics controversies especially about Ryan Lochte, lack of oversight on Charter Schools, and a bit more about Donald Trump.

23.title: Scandals

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: John Oliver talks about the scandals involving Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton.

24.title: Police Accountability

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: John Oliver looks at the police accountability system. He also talks about the first debate between Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton.

25.title: Guantánamo

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: John talks about Guantanamo Bay detention camp, Donald Trump controversies and Head of the Chechen Republic Ramzan Kadyrov.

26.title: Third Parties

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: John Oliver considers third party candidates as potential presidents.

27.title: Drugs

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: John talks about opioids, the final presidential debate and Donald Trump's charity roast.

28.title: School Segregation

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: John talks about Public schools in USA that are increasingly segregated by race and class. He discusses the troubling trend towards school resegregation.

29.title: Multilevel Marketing

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: John Oliver talks about the legitimacy of Multilevel marketing companies that seem pyramid shaped. He also talks a bit about USA election 2016 once more.

30.title: President-Elect Trump

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: John Oliver talks about the election results.

1.title: Trump vs Truth

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: John Oliver talks about Donald Trump's activities since becoming the President.

2.title: Putin

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: John Oliver talks more about the President Trump's activities specially his statements about having a nicer relationship with Russia. He also talks about Russian President Putin.

3.title: Obamacare Replacement

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: John Oliver continues to talk about ventures of US President's office. He also talks about the pros and cons of Obamacare, and the upcoming Obamacare replacement plan.

4.title: Dalai Lama

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: John Oliver talks about President Trump, Jeff Sessions and Tibet. He also conducts an interview of Dalai Lama.

5.title: American Health Care Act

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: John Oliver talks about American Health Care Act in detail. He also talks about International Women's Day and CIA Wikileaks.

6.title: Federal Budget

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The main story looks at the Trump White House's proposal for the next US budget. Oliver ends with a look at Bolivia's uses of youths costumed as zebras to make crosswalks safer and more fun.

7.title: Cannabis in the United States

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Under federal law, even legal marijuana is illegal. John Oliver explains why conflicting drug laws pose serious problems.

8.title: Gerrymandering

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: John discusses Trump's military response in Syria, Bill O' Reilly's harassment claims and the issue of Gerrymandering.

9.title: French Elections

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The presidential election in France could determine the political future of Europe. John Oliver visits an excessively French bistro to deliver an urgent message to voters.

10.title: Ivanka & Jared

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner hold an incredible amount of political power. That's troubling considering their incredibly small amount of political experience.

11.title: Net Neutrality 2

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: John Oliver points out that Net neutrality is under serious threat again and that all concerned should raise their concern to the respective authorities at all platforms.

12.title: Dialysis

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: John Oliver highlights the opportunities for improvement of the for-profit dialysis industry.

13.title: Stupid Watergate

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Stupid Watergate is a reference to Nixon presidency's scandals which led him to resign and Oliver contrasts it with current series of scandals of Trump and how they've led to talks of impeachment just within 4 months of his presidency.

14.title: Paris Agreement

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: The U.S. pull out from the Paris agreement. Plus the London terror attacks and this week in Putin.

15.title: Brexit II

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: In the wake of a divisive election, the UK will begin the process of leaving the European Union. John Oliver and an intergalactic space lord propose a plan.

16.title: Coal

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Donald Trump won coal country in the 2016 election in part by promising to do away with Obama era job killing regulations. But what is it that's really killing coal jobs and where is the most promising growth in the region.

17.title: Vaccines

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: John discusses people that are afraid to vaccinate their children out of fear.

18.title: Sinclair Broadcast Group

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: John Oliver takes on The Sinclair Broadcast Group, detainer of the majority of local news channel. He also tackles past president's of the United States with a focus on Warren G. Harding, and POTUS Donald Trump

19.title: Alex Jones

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: In response to Alex Jones' claims that the media cherry picks negatives from his "Info Wars" program, Oliver devotes a full show to Jones' popular right wing rant show.

20.title: Border Patrol

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Oliver warns that Donald Trump's desire to have a surge in border patrol agent numbers was also tried by G.W. Bush's White House with disastrous results in the quality of agents added to the force.

21.title: North Korea

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Oliver does his best to work out the thinking behind Kim Jong Un's continued push to make his nation a nuclear power regardless of the on going cost to his people.

22.title: Nuclear Waste

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: John Oliver discusses both the imminent and long-term dangers of nuclear waste deposits in the United States, and the unresolved need for governmental solutions to a now decades old problem.

23.title: Presidential Pardons

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: John Oliver talks about presidential pardons, and specifically President Trumps first pardon of Joe Arpaio. He discusses the crimes Arpaio is convicted for, and the message Trumps sends by pardoning him.

24.title: Corporate Consolidation

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: John Oliver talks about Corporate Consolidation and Anti-Trust laws, Megyn Kelly's new daytime talk show, Donald Trump vs. Black Athletes, Tim Price and Steve Mnuchin's plane scandals and the fate of the Scranton Train.

25.title: Forensic Science

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: John Oliver talks President Trump's inability to organize Puerto Rican disaster relief, the proposed Republican tax reform, and the shortcomings of forensic science - offering a glimpse at how CSI shows might be made more realistic.

26.title: Confederacy

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Confederate symbols are still celebrated despite the ugly history they symbolize.

27.title: Equifax Security Breach

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Equifax; plus, Harvey Weinstein scandal; Trump's latest strikes at Obamacare and the Iran nuclear deal.

28.title: National Flood Insurance Program

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Floods; plus, opioid epidemic; Alabama Senate Republican candidate Roy Moore; Australian vote on legalizing same-sex marriage.

29.title: Economic Development Incentives

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Economic development; plus, the latest on "Stupid Watergate;" And Now: Morning Shows Celebrating Halloween; the USPS on TV.

30.title: Presidency of Donald Trump

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: John Oliver recaps the first year of the Trump presidency and gives a warning about the three techniques he uses to undercut criticisms without addressing the related issues.

1.title: Trump vs. The World

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: John Oliver depicts how the world see America now in the era of Trump presidency. America's image is being compromised by its very own president. Not only comedians but also the world leaders are making fun of him and distancing themselves from America. Americas control over soft power is decreasing because of the vacancies in key diplomatic positions.

2.title: Italian Election

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Italian election; plus, Trump's idea to arm teachers; Canadian PM Justin Trudeau and Donald Trump Jr. in India.

3.title: NRA TV

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The NRA's streaming lifestyle network aims to boost gun sales, often by using an ominous tone that would make just about anything sound terrifying... including muffins.

4.title: Cryptocurrencies

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Tonight's main topic is 'Cryptocurrencies'. These digital currencies are creating a lot of noise nowadays. John Oliver explains the volatility of the concept, along with its perks and suggests everyone to gamble on Cryptocurrencies in a very cautious manner.

5.title: Mike Pence

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: John Oliver creates his own children's book about a bunny to compete with Mike Pence's .

6.title: Immigration Courts

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: In this episode, John Oliver covers Immigration Court.

7.title: Crisis Pregnancy Centers

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Crisis pregnancy center is an institute which talks women away from abortion by any means possible. They can practically state wrong information and misleading data to confuse women. Which is more shocking is that they are not breaking any law with these wrong advises. Moreover it is quite easy to open a crisis pregnancy center. And John Oliver did that from New York. Behold the 'Vanned Parenthood'.

8.title: Corporate Taxes

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: John Oliver talks about the Corporate Taxes. He gives examples of how big corporation always tries to evade taxes. They are using the loop holes in American tax system. He also expressed his doubts about the promises were made by the new tax plan. He used the unfruitful past experience of tax holiday to support his claim.

9.title: Iran Deal

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: 'Iran Deal' is the worst deal of all time in Donald Trump's Eyes. But John Oliver Explains Why It Is Better Than No Deal. Because this deal strictly forbade Iran to develop any sort of nuclear weapons. And all of their declared nuclear sites have close monitoring, as well as any suspected site could be monitored within 24 days of the request. The sad part is, top advisers of Trump administration are also against the deal. That is why John prepared a new ad with catheter cowboy to explain the matter to Trump and scheduled it on his favorite Sean Hannity's show.

10.title: Rudy Giuliani

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Rudy Giuliani is the newest addition to the Trump's lawyers. He revealed some pretty damaging stuff about the Stormy Daniels story, which contradicts his employer's statement. But it is not a new thing for Rudy Giuliani because he was doing it throughout his career and was always eager to appear in television or limelight even if it is the lamest way possible.

11.title: Venezuela

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Venezuela is in deep economic crisis. People in Venezuela are suffering immensely for the epic management from Nicolás Maduro's government. That is why people are now taking desperate measures like violent protests, food riots etc. Despite the extreme conditions Maduro failed to content the situation, instead he made the inflation unbearable. As well as Maduro changed Venezuela's democratic process to stay in power and eventually dominated the election where there was virtually no actual opponents.

12.title: Rehab

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Rehab is a billion dollar industry of USA. But this enormous addiction treatment industry is not regulated enough. That is why they can claim a high success rate of their facility without any hard evidence. Not only that they have a practice of using urine of addicts to make money. Which is known as the liquid gold in recovery industry.

13.title: Guardianship

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: John Oliver discusses a surprising letter from Kim Jong-un to President Trump, journalist Arkady Babchenko's rising from the grave, a British royal expert born an Italian American, and the fraught issue of senior citizen guardianship.

14.title: Stupid Watergate II

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: This was the second installment 'Stupid Watergate'. As it is not possible to indict a sitting president according the law the only way left is the impeachment and Trump knows that very well. So his team and allies are trying to undermine the Muller Investigation by denying facts, spreading lies and creating baseless conspiracy theories. Because if the public have enough doubts in their mind about any wrongdoings by Trump administration, Trump will not be impeached as public opinion matters a lot in this matter. Therefore Trump will remain immune to any possible ...

15.title: Xi Jinping

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Chinese president Xi Jinping is putting China into the world map. Previously China had a lay low international strategy which is known as 'hide your strength and bide your time'. But Xi Jinping is choosing a different path, he wants to let the world to know more about china and vice versa. And he is extremely popular among Chinese people because of their lasting economical growth and crackdown of corrupt government officials. As his influence is growing in the world with massive economy and infrastructure plans there is a growing concern also, as he is becoming more ...

16.title: Mexican Elections

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Biggest Mexican election in history is underway. In present times, the sitting president Enrique Peña Nieto is hugely disliked by the Mexican mango people for the vast corruption of his administration. There is even a 'Corrupt Tour' where visitors and tourists can learn about the places and city landmarks where allegedly corruptions with public money occurred. As Mexico has one term rule for presidents so Mexico will replace him soon with one of these potential candidates: Andrés Manuel López Obrador or Ricardo Anaya Cortés. John Oliver then explains these candidates ...

17.title: Gene Editing

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: 'Gene Editing' is a very fascinating field. It has enormous potential to improve the human life. While many scientists are extremely cautious about their experiments, there are also some who handles the matters about gene editing quite lightly. John Oliver explains the different risks, possible rewards of gene editing.

18.title: Workplace Sexual Harassment

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: After tackling "Stupid Watergate," Oliver talks about the subject of workplace sexual harassment and hosts a special interview.

19.title: Prosecutors

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: John Oliver talks about an important but less known element of America's criminal justice system: 'Prosecutors'. Prosecutors held an powerful influence over cases but have not much accountability about their decisions. As nearly 95 percent of the cases that prosecutors decide to prosecute end up with the defendant pleading guilty without going to trial, prosecutors can easily misuse their power by withholding important evidences which might led to wrongful convictions.

20.title: Astroturfing

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: After discussing racists, John talks about astroturfing.

21.title: Trade

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: Donald Trump is waging a trade war that hurts a lot of American workers.

22.title: Felony Disenfranchisement

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Felony Disenfranchisement is what Jon Oliver talks about. Many people who had felony convictions are unfairly restricted from voting rights even long after of serving his/her conviction. And there is no clear instruction or process to regain the voting status. People have to rely on the whims of a clemency board which is absurd.

23.title: Facebook

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: After commenting the recent allegation of sexual misconduct against Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh, John Oliver looks at the troubling impact Facebook is making internationally, such as on the Rohingya crisis in Myanmar.

24.title: Kavanaugh

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: John Oliver discusses the ongoing controversy surrounding Brett Kavanaugh, the sexual assault allegations against him, his Supreme Court nomination, and what that could all mean for the highest (mostly-dog) court in the land.

25.title: Brazilian Elections

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: Brazil is going to have its 2018 Brazilian general election. John Oliver introduces the candidates who might have the chance to win the election. He then talks about the growing unrest regarding this election among general people as all the candidates are worse than each other. Among all the candidates Bolsonaro is the worst and he is also compared as the Brazilan Trump. Sadly he is doing well in the election, that is why a new movement emerged opposing him which is called #EleNao (#NotHim). Finally John Oliver requested all Brazilian to save themselves by voting ...

26.title: Saudi Arabia

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Saudi Arabia, despite their numerous human right violations is a long standing close ally of United States of America. John Oliver states the reasons behind the unconventional camaraderie between these two nations. Past few presidents of America also turned a blind eye to all the wrongdoings of Saudi Arabia.Then he talks about how Trump is boosting the confidence of autocratic Saudi regime more than ever by showing unconditional support because of the billion dollar business promises. Renowned journalist Jamal Khashoggi, a critic of Saudi royal family might be the ...

27.title: State Attorneys General

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: John Oliver briefly catches up with last week's events: deadliest attack on Synagogue, Saudi's lamest explanation of Jamal Khashoggi murder. Then he talks about the State Attorneys General. He explains the importance of role and contribution State AGs. State AGs are very powerful as they sue the federal government. So the races to elect these influential peoples are worth voters' attention.

28.title: Family Separation

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: John Oliver gives a quick recap about the USA's midterm election activities. Then he talks about the main story of the night: Family Separation. He discussed the absurdity of the policy and the toll it takes on the families of the immigrants. He also stated his sincere concern about the fact that it could very possibly happen again.

29.title: Drain the Swamp

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: Firstly, John Oliver addresses the firing/resignation of Attorney General of the United States Jeff Sessions and his successor. Then he starts talking about the catch phrase Trump used in his campaign 'Drain the swamp'. John illustrates that how little Trump had done to drain the swamp, rather he is nurturing him and appointing them in key positions to make favorable decisions for the lobbyists. Finally he closes with the fact how celebrities earning millions of dollars by promoting products in social media without proper declaration of an ad post.

30.title: Authoritarianism

episode of.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: [HBO] HD. Main story: A look at the growing number of authoritarian leaders around the world. Plus, the fate of Russell Crowe's jockstrap.

locations: CBS Broadcast Center, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: With his insightful wit and fearless candor, comedian John Oliver, formerly of the The Daily Show (1996), reviews the crazy current affairs happening in America and around the world. In doing so, he provides a wry perspective that punctures pomposity and cuts through all pretensions with comically outrageous audacity. In doing so, he can get to the heart of the matter of the world's most serious and absurd problems with plenty of laughs along the way.
imdb.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
plot: Former Daily Show host and correspondent John Oliver brings his persona to this new weekly news satire program.::Noah

With his insightful wit and fearless candor, comedian John Oliver, formerly of the _The Daily Show (1996)_ (qv), reviews the crazy current affairs happening in America and around the world. In doing so, he provides a wry perspective that punctures pomposity and cuts through all pretensions with comically outrageous audacity. In doing so, he can get to the heart of the matter of the world's most serious and absurd problems with plenty of laughs along the way.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)
